page.title: 18GAMES WE PLAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: Children play football, netball, British bull dog, stuck in the mud, or cricket. Boys mostly play football, cricket, british bull dogs, and stuck in the mud. Girls mostly play netball, British bull dogs and stuck in the mud.About five girls play football.I like football i think its the best game.You play football by kicking the ball in each goal at each other.To play netball you bounce the ball on the floor. when you get to the net you throw the ball in a net.You play british bull dogs by calling somone. They have to make it to the other end if he gets caught, he helps the other person. If he makes it eyery one can run to the other end.To play stuck in the mud you run; if the monster catches you three times you will be stuck.
